summary: A test utility for the sendmail configuration file (cf) parser. This program demonstrates retrieving specific option values from a sendmail configuration file, and is likely used for testing or debugging configuration settings.

logs.reason: Informs the user about the correct usage pattern when the program is invoked with an incorrect number of arguments
logs.resolution: Invoke the program with exactly two arguments: the path to a sendmail configuration file and the name of an option to look up

logs.reason: Reports errors encountered when trying to read or parse the specified configuration file, showing the file path and the error message
logs.resolution: Check file permissions, existence, and format of the specified configuration file. The error message will provide specific details about what went wrong

logs.reason: Indicates that the requested option name was not found in the configuration file
logs.resolution: Verify that the option name is spelled correctly and exists in the specified configuration file. You may need to add the option to your sendmail configuration

logs.reason: Displays the successful result of an option lookup, showing the option name and its value
logs.resolution: Informational log, no resolution required. This indicates successful operation
